common_failures.cause: Insufficient grip strength or improper grip technique
common_failures.resolution: Adjust grip and ensure secure contact with the object before lifting.

common_failures.cause: Object is too heavy or exceeds the lifting capability of the agent
common_failures.resolution: Use a tool or assistance to lift heavy objects, or divide the load into smaller parts.

common_failures.cause: Loss of grip or imbalance while moving
common_failures.resolution: Maintain consistent grip pressure and move slowly to ensure balance.
Use a gentle grip and appropriate handling techniques for fragile items.

common_failures.cause: Object is located out of reach or in an obstructed position
common_failures.resolution: Use an extended tool or reposition the object to make it accessible.

common_failures.cause: Object's shape or texture prevents a secure hold
common_failures.resolution: Adjust grip position or use a tool designed for irregularly shaped objects.

common_failures.cause: Improper stance or heavy load causing instability
common_failures.resolution: Ensure proper body positioning and distribute weight evenly before lifting.

common_failures.cause: Adhesion or friction between the object and the surface
common_failures.resolution: Apply additional force or use a tool to separate the object from the surface.
Verify the object's identity before attempting to pick it up.

common_failures.cause: Improper handling or sharp edges on the object
common_failures.resolution: Use protective gloves and ensure careful handling of objects with sharp edges.
